pops.name: Muichiro Tokito (Chase)
pops.description: Muichiro Tokito, the Mist Hashira from Demon Slayer, is known for his exceptional swordsmanship and mastery of the Mist Breathing techniques. This Chase variant captures his unique appearance with a special glow-in-the-dark feature.

pops.name: tanjiro Kamado
pops.description: Tanjiro Kamado, the main protagonist of Demon Slayer, is known for his unwavering determination and exceptional swordsmanship. This normal variant captures his unique appearance without the glow-in-the-dark feature.

pops.name: Tanjiro Kamado (hot topic exclusive)
pops.description: This Hot Topic exclusive features Tanjiro Kamado wearing his signature mask, showcasing his dedication and warrior spirit. A must-have for any Demon Slayer fan.
